long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on an ocean adventure with Moana in this beautiful Moana Live Wallpaper for your new tab, bringing the spirit of the sea to your browser.

Experience the freedom of the ocean and the bravery of Moana through dynamic animated scenes, making every new tab feel like a voyage across the vast Pacific.

Features:
🌊 Live Wallpaper: Watch Moana’s daring journey come to life with stunning oceanic animations.
🌐 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites quickly with convenient pre-set shortcuts.
➕ Addable Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab by adding links to your most-visited sites.
🔍 Search Bar: Easily search the web with your preferred search engine.
🕒 Calendar & Clock: Stay organized with a built-in clock and calendar display.
Why Choose This Extension?
This extension is secure, easy to use, and respects your privacy. It can be uninstalled at any time via the extension settings.

Explore more live wallpapers featuring Disney characters, adventure themes, and oceanic beauty. The menu also includes a note-taking tool, a privacy policy, and a simple uninstall option.

Download the Moana Live Wallpaper now and let the adventure begin with each new tab. Discover more at our website!
